explains: v. 使不流行（outmode 的过去分词）

sentences.en: The political system has become thoroughly outmoded.
sentences.cn: 这种政治体系已经彻底过时了。

sentences.en: Romania badly needs aid to modernize its outmoded industries.
sentences.cn: 罗马尼亚迫切需要援助以对其过时的产业进行现代化。

sentences.en: Certain jobs have gone away for good, outmoded by machines.
sentences.cn: 某些工作因为被机器取代而永远消失了。
